revised_title: Advanced Materials and Optoelectronic Devices in the 1990s
tldr: This article discusses the development of advanced materials and optoelectronic devices in the 1990s, focusing on low-dimensional modulated structures. The author highlights the importance of semiconductor materials like GaAs and the use of layered structures for efficient optoelectronic conversion. The article also explores the evolution of materials technology and the development of techniques for fabricating ultra-thin layers, leading to improved optoelectronic devices.
